name: Condiment Kills
description:
Welcome to Condiment Kills, a horror side-scroller where you collect condiments to escape. This stands as a concept demo for the full game. The final build will include many more features.  

 

You play as Jeremy, a boy who longs for an interesting hobby. He stumbles upon a cult that makes decisions based on food related items. Feeling like he finally found something, Jeremy joins the cult.  After a week, Jeremy was instructed to enter the worlds of condiments to retrieve sauces for the cult's latest project. Who knows where this will take Jeremy ?

This demo is a part of the first level. Collect all of the mayonnaise to exit the world. Collect the coins to achieve a good score. In later builds the coins will reward you with various things. Escape from traps and enemies to survive. Can you take the heat?
